description.value:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Aura]{Aura}

The graveknight's visage is one of overwhelming menace. When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:] saving throw. A creature that fails is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Doomed]{Doomed 1} (or doomed 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure). The graveknight can activate or deactivate the aura by using an Interact action to open or close their helmet visor.
